mapper.insert: insert into ms_comment(content, create_date, article_id, author_id, parent_id, to_uid, level) values (#{content}, #{createDate}, #{articleId}, #{authorId}, #{parentId}, #{toUid}, #{level})
mapper.select: SELECT parent_comment.*, child_comment.id child_id, child_comment.content child_content, child_comment.create_date child_create_date, child_comment.article_id child_article_id, child_comment.author_id child_author_id, child_comment.parent_id child_parent_id, child_comment.to_uid child_to_uid, child_comment.`level` child_level, parent_author.id parent_author_id, parent_author.avatar parent_author_avatar, parent_author.nickname parent_author_nickname, child_author.id child_author_id, child_author.avatar child_author_avatar, child_author.nickname child_author_nickname, parent_to_user.id parent_to_user_id, parent_to_user.avatar parent_to_user_avatar, parent_to_user.nickname parent_to_user_nickname, child_to_user.id child_to_user_id, child_to_user.avatar child_to_user_avatar, child_to_user.nickname child_to_user_nickname FROM ms_comment child_comment RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ms_comment WHERE LEVEL = 1 AND article_id = #{articleId} ) parent_comment ON child_comment.parent_id = parent_comment.id AND child_comment.`level` = 2 LEFT JOIN ms_sys_user parent_author ON parent_comment.author_id = parent_author.id LEFT JOIN ms_sys_user child_author ON child_comment.author_id = child_author.id LEFT JOIN ms_sys_user parent_to_user ON parent_comment.to_uid = parent_to_user.id LEFT JOIN ms_sys_user child_to_user ON child_comment.to_uid = child_to_user.id;
